product.name: LED Vanity Lights for Bathroom,4 Light Chrome Bathroom Vanity Light with Grid Glass Shade,Stainless Steel 30 Inch Dimmable Wall Light Fixtures 3000K/4500K/6000K
product.description:
At
,We concentrate on efforts to create modern light fixtures. Committed to bringing a sense of elegance and sparkling every angle in your house.
is a professional lighting company with more than 10 years of experience, also has its own factory. specializing in chandelier, ceiling light fan, wall sconce, etc.
Make your house brighter, more elegant, more modern!
The boho wicker rattan wall sconces usually have a unique style and design.
Ours black wall sconce is a great lighting or decoration for any home areas!
Modern Sconces! Make your house brighter, more elegant!
Stainless Steel LED Wall Sconce with Glass Lampshade
4 Light Stainless Steel LED Bathroom Lights over Mirror
High CRI Modern Bathroom Light Fixtures
product.bullet_points:
• Sleek Modern Original Design: Elevate your space with ‎Wvsrbyr LED bathroom vanity light, expertly crafted with frosted grid pattern glass shades and a sturdy stainless steel finish, which is fashionable and beautiful. The size of the bathroom light fixtures is 30.9"L x 7.09 "W x 2.17"H, can make the light of bathroom shine evenly, soft and comfortable
• 3 Color Temperature＆Dimmable Adjustable: Our modern bathroom vanity light offer 3 color temperature options (3000K/4500K/6000K) to meet your needs by setting warm white light, neutral light, and cool white light. This bathroom light fixtures over mirror can meet your brightness requirements, with an adjustable brightness range of 10% to 100%, and is compatible with most standard dimmers (excluding dimmers)
• Premium Glass & Durability Metal: Our bathroom vanity lights over mirror features a robust all-metal stainless steel construction, including reinforced metal holding rings.The sturdy modern bathroom light fixtures lampbody ensures stability, preventing rust、corrosion bending or misalignment during use or transport. Premium glass shades are securely held in place for optimal safety, providing peace of mind
• Energy saving LED lighting: This chrome vanity lights for bathroom comes with built-in LED chips and high-quality driver that ensure a lifespan of up to 50000 hours. You can enjoy a brightness of 20W 2200LM. The 4 light bathroom vanity light do not flicker or glare, the light is natural and not glaring, creating a good lighting effect
• Easy to Install: The packaging of the bathroom wall light comes with all installation hardware and instructions. You only need to install the lampshade of the long bathroom light fixtures and complete the wiring of the reserved wires. There is an installation video on the link. If you have any questions about installation, you can check it out. This lamp is suitable for junction boxes in the United States
